basic.description: A course unit will be composed of two modules on various topics in GeoEngineering and Applied Geoscience. Each module will consist of a workshop or short course as approved by the GeoEngineering Graduate Coordinator. The unit will be completed within two years. Specific modules to be available during each academic year will be announced in September or, in exceptional circumstances, as opportunities arise.   I.D. Moore  Term: F, W, NS as modules are available.
basic.subject: GENG
basic.title: Spec Topics Geoengineering II
